lead_paragraph: British Cycling's former technical director Shane Sutton insists he is not a sexist and denies ever telling rider Jess Varnish to 'go and have a baby' after she was dropped from the team.

headline.print_headline: Sutton Denies Sexism, Questions British Cycling Investigation
headline.main: Sutton Denies Sexism, Questions British Cycling Investigation

snippet: British Cycling's former technical director Shane Sutton insists he is not a sexist and denies ever telling rider Jess Varnish to 'go and have a baby' after she was dropped from the team....
